document_data.name: Rapha
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Rapha''' was one of the [[Shadovar]] of [[Thultanthar]] that served [[Princes of Shade|Prince]] [[Escanor Tanthul]], ''circa'' the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a large, intimidating [[shade]]<ref group="note">While Rapha's race is not explicitly stated, his description as looking "like an obsidian statue than a live man" along with his gem-colored eyes found among other shades, suggests he is a shade himself. with red eyes that glittered like [[rubies]].
document_data.Activities: Rapha was trusted enough by Prince Escanor to served in his place in the case he was injured or otherwise incapacitated.
document_data.History: In [[Tarsakh]] of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Rapha was among the Shadovar present at the [[splicing]] of the [[shadowshell]], a barrier of [[shadowstuff]] the Shadovar formed over the [[Greycloak Hills]] to trap the recently-released [[phaerimm]] within. When Escanor was injured during the splicing, Rapha look over lead of the operation and helped bring the injured Prince of Shade back to Thultanthar.
